pages.text: The time has come to try something new. This ritual allows you to establish a connection with the Nether and summon a Demon of Gluttony to the Overworld - a formidable and eternally hungry foe who, should it defeat you, will not only rend your body but feast upon your very soul. Details about this infernal creature are provided in the $(l:demonology/gluttony_demon)bestiary$().
